settings.custom_liquid: SHIPPING POLICY

settings.rich_text:
All orders require 2 business days for processing. Transit times are determined by shipping method. If your order is time sensitive, please contact our Customer Service team at (1-800-400-1995, option 4).

Please visit the checkout page in the shop to estimate shipping charges.

RETURN POLICY

We strive for 100% satisfaction with all GU Energy products. If you are unhappy with any item purchased at GUenergy.com, you may return it for a replacement or refund within 60 days.
